name: iBAG MULTI PORTABLE
description:
Every iBag is expertly handmade with only the best leather hides which is then complimented by accents of felt. Carry it unfolded as a briefcase, shoulder bag, backpack or fold it into a courier or clutch bag » Italian vegetable tanned leather » Fits a New MacBook Pro 13" and 15" or old 17" » Fits a MacBook Air 11" and 13" » External back zipper pocket fits the new iPad, and iPad Mini » Removable and adjustable felt and leather shoulder strap » Inside space for magazines, books, sweater etc. » Flexible shock absorbant protective inner layer » Wipe clean Inner lining in black » Inside zipper iPhone and wallet pocket Unfolded inside measurements: » 16" x 13" (41 x 34cm) approx.
